name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Obama released his 2010 tax return. It turns out that he made $1.7 million and spent $14 trillion.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Donald Trump said that if President Obama releases his birth certificate, Trump will release his tax return. Obama said he won’t run for a second term if Trump releases that thing on his head.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Gary Busey said he would vote for Donald Trump. Now Trump just needs to get the endorsements of Randy Quaid and Charlie Sheen.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The FAA suspended an air traffic controller for watching a movie on the job. The controller said he was only watching a movie because he couldn’t sleep.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama celebrated Passover with a Seder at the White House. This morning, Donald Trump demanded to see Obama’s bar mitzvah certificate.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Trump accused George Stephanopoulos of being co-opted by Obama’s minions. Anyone who knows Stephanopoulos knows he’s minion-proof — and lactose intolerant.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Speaker of the House John Boehner says he will not host a Cinco de Mayo celebration this year. Boehner says he has nothing against Hispanic Americans, and in fact his speaker of the housekeeper is Hispanic.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Apparently there’s something about those poor, defenseless piñatas being beaten with sticks that makes Boehner cry.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Elton John announced that he will be doing three years of shows at Caesars Palace. If you don’t know it, it’s a gaudy old landmark that’s past its best — and Caesars Palace is a casino.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The 2011 Pulitzer prizes were given out for excellence in journalism and as usual, I didn’t win a thing.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Most of you don’t think of me as a journalist — because I’m not.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: I don’t get my news from the paper anymore, I just get it from my iPhone. The news is always the same: no service.
